sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react" class Form extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", age: "", gender: "", location: "", favFood: "" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { const {name, value, type, checked} = event.target type === "checkbox" ? this.setState({[name]: checked}) : this.setState({ [name]: value}) } render() { return (






{this.state.firstName} {this.state.lastName}

Your age are {this.state.age}

You are a {this.state.gender}

Your location is {this.state.location}

Your favorite food is {this.state.favFood}

) } } export default Form
